STEPS.STEP: Brownie: Melt chocolate and 150g butter and combine, then add 3 eggs, 150g sugar and 90g flour.
Cookie: Melt 100g butter and mix 165g sugar then add 1 egg and 230g flour then add chocolate chips.
Put brownie in tin then cook for 10 mins at 160°C then add cookie dough and cook for another 20-30 mins at 180°C.
